pages.text: Pomatrum is a vetulicolian, an enigmatic animal from the early Cambrian which had a tube shaped body and a tail. They also had every gill slits on the side of its body and a mouth at the end of the body, with no eyes.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
